languages.text: {n}Ксенос поводит головой, следя за вами и осматривая помещение. Мышечная судорога, что сводила все его тело в боевой стойке, исчезла... однако его лицо все еще перекошено не то зверским, не то испуганным выражением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос поводит головой, следя за вами и осматривая помещение. Мышечная судорога, что сводила все его тело в боевой стойке, исчезла... однако его лицо все еще перекошено не то зверским, не то испуганным выражением.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос поводит головой, следя за вами и осматривая помещение. Мышечная судорога, что сводила все его тело в боевой стойке, исчезла... однако его лицо все еще перекошено не то зверским, не то испуганным выражением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Le xénos tourne la tête en tous sens, surveillant à la fois la pièce et vous-même. Ses muscles ne sont plus tendus dans une posture de combat, mais son visage est toujours déformé par une expression qui évoque à la fois la fureur et la terreur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos tourne la tête en tous sens, surveillant à la fois la pièce et vous-même. Ses muscles ne sont plus tendus dans une posture de combat, mais son visage est toujours déformé par une expression qui évoque à la fois la fureur et la terreur.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}異種族は首を何度も振って部屋を見渡しつつも、まだあなたを見ている。戦闘態勢による金の区の硬直はもはや解けているが、その顔にはまだ荒々しい狂乱とも恐怖ともとれる歪んだ表情を浮かんでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は首を何度も振って部屋を見渡しつつも、まだあなたを見ている。戦闘態勢による金の区の硬直はもはや解けているが、その顔にはまだ荒々しい狂乱とも恐怖ともとれる歪んだ表情を浮かんでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋正在不断地转着头，打量着房间，但依然紧盯着你。他的肌肉不再僵硬，战斗的姿势也缓和了下来，但他脸上依然带着扭曲的表情，看起来既像是发了疯，又像是被吓坏了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋正在不断地转着头，打量着房间，但依然紧盯着你。他的肌肉不再僵硬，战斗的姿势也缓和了下来，但他脸上依然带着扭曲的表情，看起来既像是发了疯，又像是被吓坏了。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos dreht den Kopf hin und her, überblickt den Raum, beobachtet dich aber weiterhin. Seine Muskeln sind nicht mehr steif in einer Kampfhaltung verkrampft, doch sein Gesicht trägt einen verzerrten Ausdruck, der sich als wilde Raserei oder aber gewaltige Furcht deuten lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos dreht den Kopf hin und her, überblickt den Raum, beobachtet dich aber weiterhin. Seine Muskeln sind nicht mehr steif in einer Kampfhaltung verkrampft, doch sein Gesicht trägt einen verzerrten Ausdruck, der sich als wilde Raserei oder aber gewaltige Furcht deuten lässt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}El xenos bambolea la cabeza hacia delante y hacia atrás, inspeccionando la sala pero sin quitarte un ojo de encima. Ya no tiene los músculos tensos en una postura de combate, pero su rostro aún exhibe una intensa emoción que podría interpretarse como frenesí salvaje o terror abyecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos bambolea la cabeza hacia delante y hacia atrás, inspeccionando la sala pero sin quitarte un ojo de encima. Ya no tiene los músculos tensos en una postura de combate, pero su rostro aún exhibe una intensa emoción que podría interpretarse como frenesí salvaje o terror abyecto.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Başını ileri geri çevirerek odayı inceleyen zeno, bir yandan da seni göz hapsinde tutmayı sürdürüyor. Kasları artık her an çatışmaya girecekmiş gibi gergin olmasa da vahşi bir delilik veya dehşet olarak yorumlanabilecek, çarpık yüz ifadesini koruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is turning his head back and forth, surveying the room but still watching you. His muscles are no longer cramped stiff in a battle stance, but his face still bears a twisted expression that can either be interpreted as wild frenzy or terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno, başını ileri geri çevirerek odayı inceliyor ama seni de hâlâ göz hapsinde tutuyor. Kasları artık her an çatışmaya girecekmiş gibi gergin değil ancak yüzünde hâlâ vahşi bir delilik veya dehşet olarak yorumlanabilecek, çarpık bir ifade var.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
